p: The first successful induction of SE in centaury was obtained in a cell suspension derived from callus cultures [ 49]. The calli were initiated from roots and shoots of seedlings on medium supplemented with kinetin (KIN, 10 −6 M) and auxins indole-3-acetic acid (IAA, 10 −5 M) or 2,4-D (10 −6 M). In contrast to 2,4-D, IAA showed a stimulatory effect on SE induction from the cell suspension, but light was the main embryogenesis-inducing factor in this system.
